doc.title: Na kraju tunela
doc.plot: Tunnel's End is a documentary that investigates the key factors which led Bosnia-Herzegovina first to war in the 1990s, and subsequently into the social and political paralysis the country is suffering today. The film steers clear from making the case for one side or the other; instead director Lle칩 presents a comprehensive and complex view of contemporary Bosnia-Herzegovina. Through extensive interviews with politicians, human rights activists, journalists, artists, and war survivors from all ethnic groups.
